channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ninja Swirl by Creami Soft Serve Machine Review: Joy in Every Cup
item.description: Buying a Ninja Swirl is almost as good as having your own personal frozen yogurt shop.

item.title: What Really Happened With the DDoS Attacks That Took Down X
item.description: Elon Musk said a “massive cyberattack” disrupted X on Monday and pointed to “IP addresses originating in the Ukraine area” as the source of the attack...

item.title: Mark Cuban says AI is ‘never the answer,’ it’s a ‘tool’
item.description: Speaking at the SXSW conference in Austin, Texas, tech investor and entrepreneur Mark Cuban shared his thoughts on how AI technology can help small bu...

item.title: Apple Mac Studio (M4 Max, 2025) Review: Small but Mighty
item.description: For creatives who need the very highest level of performance, the Mac Studio delivers it—and then some.

item.title: 8 Best Cheap Phones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These iPhones and Android devices—ranging from $150 to $600—stood up to WIRED’s testing.

item.title: OpenAI launches new tools to help businesses build AI agents
item.description: On Tuesday, OpenAI released new tools designed to help developers and enterprises build AI agents – automated systems that can independently accomplis...

item.title: Hugging Face expands its LeRobot platform with training data for self-driving machines
item.description: Last year, Hugging Face, the AI dev platform, launched LeRobot, a collection of open AI models, data sets, and tools to help build real-world robotics...

item.title: Virtual physical therapists Hinge Health files for IPO, estimated to raise $500M
item.description: Hinge Health, a 10-year-old company that offers a digital solution to treat chronic musculoskeletal (MSK) conditions, filed to go public. Although Hin...

item.title: Apple MacBook Air (13-Inch, M4) Review: More Power for Less Money
item.description: This lightweight machine comes equipped with a bit more power and some necessary improvements, all for a more affordable price.

item.title: Waymo expands its robotaxi service across Silicon Valley
